Title: Buyer
Description: A buyer is an entity whose budget will be used to pay for goods, works or services related to a contract.

Title: Procuring Entity
Description: The entity managing the procurement, which may be different from the buyer who is paying / using the items being procured.

Title: Supplier
Description: The entity awarded or contracted to provide supplies, works or services.

Title: Tenderer
Description: All entities who submit a tender

Title: Funder
Description: The funder is an entity providing money or finance for this contracting process or project.

Title: Enquirer
Description: A party who has made an enquiry during the enquiry phase of a contracting process.

Title: Payer
Description: A party making a payment from a transaction

Title: Payee
Description: A party in receipt of a payment from a transaction

Title: Review Body
Description: A party responsible for the review of this procurement process. This party often has a role in any challenges made to the contract award.

Title: Public Authority
Description: The unit/body/department within a government that is tendering and contracting the project.

Title: Administrative Entity
Description: The entity responsible for contract administration
